    New Website!

    Posted on Thursday July 31, 2008 by Jacob Campbell.

    I just bought this new domain… and am pretty excited about it. I expect to see this blog plus jacobrcampbell.com change very drastically in the near future. If you want to see my old blog or my previous web site please feel free.
